item.title: Trump energy department loosens rules on nuclear safety
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description: The new rules apply to nuclear reactors built on Department of Energy property, which includes several currently being developed by startups.

item.title: Microsoft gained $7.6B from OpenAI last quarter
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: Microsoft, one of OpenAI's major investors, is benefiting greatly from the AI lab's growth.

item.title: Tesla is killing off the Model S and Model X
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: The company will stop making the pioneering EVs in the second quarter of 2026, CEO Elon Musk announced Wednesday.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says a future without smart glasses is ‘hard to imagine’
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: Take Zuckerberg's outlook with a grain of salt. After all, he thought we'd all be hanging out in the metaverse by now.

item.title: Tesla invested $2B in Elon Musk’s xAI
item.dc:creator: Kirsten Korosec
item.description: Elon Musk's AI company xAI disclosed earlier this month it had raised $20 billion.

item.title: Elon Musk teases a new image-labeling system for X… we think?
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Elon Musk says X will begin identifying "manipulated media" but doesn't share details.

item.title: SpaceX is coming to the public markets, and secondaries are already on fire
item.dc:creator: Theresa Loconsolo
item.description: paceX is reportedly lining up four major Wall Street banks for a 2026 IPO that could provide the reset the market needs.  The company just completed a tender offer at an $800 billion valuation, and secondary market demand is through the roof. If SpaceX goes public anywhere near its rumored $1.5 trillion valuation, it could trigger an IPO cascade for other late-stage unicorns like OpenAI, Stripe, and Databricks.  Watch as Equity host Rebecca Bellan […]

item.title: AI security startup Outtake raises $40M from Iconiq, Satya Nadella, Bill Ackman, and other big names
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: Outtake makes an agentic cybersecurity platform to help enterprises detect identity fraud. Its angel investors read like a who's who of tech industry names.

item.title: Tesla profit tanked 46% in 2025
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: The company's sales fell for a second year in a row, as Tesla looks to AI and robotics, including a new $2 billion investment in CEO Elon Musk's company xAI.

item.title: ServiceNow inks another AI partnership, this time with Anthropic
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description: ServiceNow partners with Anthropic just a week after announcing a partnership with OpenAI as the company takes a multi-model approach.

item.title: Luminar sale approved despite last-minute mystery bid
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: An unidentified bidder submitted a Hail Mary offer that was "substantially higher" than the winning bid at auction. Founder Austin Russell has been circling a bid, but it's not clear he was behind it.

item.title: WhatsApp will now charge AI chatbots to operate in Italy
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: WhatsApp plans to charge developers of AI chatbots per message.

item.title: Jennifer Garner’s Once Upon a Farm resumes IPO plans
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: The organic kids' snack food company may debut as soon as next week. It has issued a price range for shares, an SEC filing shows.

item.title: AI data labeler Handshake buys Cleanlab, an acquisition target of multiple others
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: The deal’s purpose is primarily to acquire talent, aka an acqui-hire, adding nine key Cleanlab employees to Handshake’s research organization.

item.title: Chrome takes on AI browsers with tighter Gemini integration, agentic features for autonomous tasks
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: Google Chrome is adding Gemini in the sidebar and is rolling out an agentic feature for AI Pro and Ultra users.

item.title: Apple tells Patreon to move creators to in-app purchase for subscriptions by November
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Patreon isn’t happy about Apple’s new subscription billing mandate, arguing Apple’s shifting rules create uncertainty for creators.

item.title: Tiny startup Arcee AI built a 400B-parameter open source LLM from scratch to best Meta’s Llama
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: 30-person startup Arcee AI has released a 400B model called Trinity, which it says is one of the biggest open source foundation models from a U.S. company.

item.title: Elon Musk reportedly wants a June SpaceX IPO to align with his birthday, the planets
item.dc:creator: Dominic-Madori Davis
item.description: SpaceX eyes June for IPO to align with Musk's birthday and the planets.

item.title: With Apple’s new Creator Studio Pro, AI is a tool to aid creation, not replace it
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Apple’s Creator Studio Pro leverages AI to help creators with tedious tasks — like finding clips or building slides — without trying to do the work for them.

item.title: San Francisco Police Department investigating Zoox collision with a parked car
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: The investigation is looking into a January 17 crash where a Zoox robotaxi hit the driver's-side door of a parked car, which Zoox said was "suddenly opened."
